-e ---

# black

𓐍 𓐍 kara/kala > char/coal 𓆓 𓂝

𓐍 𓐍 blue-black color

𓐍 kàr-á kɐrt- kareð @ Omotic

𒄖𒄴𒇻 gu-uḫ-lu guḫlu kohl ( kala = black colors 𒄴 ≈ 𓐍 ) <> Kolk-Rabe

𓆓 𓂝 𓃀 𓏏 𓈒 𓏥 | charcoal, soot | ϫⲉⲃⲥ coal
𓆓 𓂝 𓌠 𓃀 | coal-black |
𓆓 𓂝 𓏏 𓐎 𓏥 | vein (of ore) | žílat , žilka / slot > soot

𓋴 𓃀 𓆓 𓂂 | kaspian™ | ⇔ blue-black sea
𓐍 𓋴 𓃀 𓆓 𓂂 | chars•black | … 𓃀 𓆓 𓂂 beltz
𓐍 kara kala char color
𓐍 kaka 𓎡𓎡𓇰 လ္စံက် kəcɔk
𓆎 #khm ខ្មៅ khmaw chemie
𓈖 𓅘 𓎛 𓋴 𓏮 𓌙 𓀀 | Nubian | Negro
𓈖 𓎛 𓋴 𓏮 𓌙 𓀏 | Nubian | Negro
𓈖 𓅘 𓎛 𓆓 𓏏 𓄑 | tooth, tusk | Nager(dent)
𓈖 𓎼 𓏏 𓏴 𓀜 | breach (in dam) | √negate
𓈖 𓇋 𓎡 𓂢 𓀀 | evil doer | √Nicht? Neger :(
𓈖 𓆑 𓅪 | wrong | נכון nakhon = true ƒ
𓈖 𓈗 | dwarf | √nieder / Neger
𓈖 negro <> 𓈖 नील nīl “blue” 🐃 <> black

𓂧 𓈖 𓎼 𓄔 𓀀 | pygmy, dwarf | dunkel √negro
𓏏 𓍃 𓅓 𓂜 negative
𓏏 𓉔 𓂾 𓂻 | neglect

𓆼 𓄿 𓅱 𓏮 𓇰 | night | gau @ basque ⇔ grau
𓎼 𓂋 𓎛 𓇰 | night | grau
𓐍 𓆼 𓄿 𓅱𓇰 | night | √kara

𒂊𒄖 e-gu kohl ⇔ kala char 𓐍
𒄩𒇻 ḫa-lu (black) mole on skin

char ⇔ charm
𒄩𒈬 ḫa-mu chaff, raft, rubbish √khem:black/dirt

"περκνός" perknos, meaning "blue-black"
